delete_alert.title: Account Deletion
delete_alert.description: All transactions associated with this account will be deleted along with the account. This check can be disabled in the settings.

delete_alert.title: Category Deletion
delete_alert.description: All transactions associated with this category will be deleted along with the category. This check can be disabled in the settings.
